-- | Generic type-level comparison of types
--   
--   Generic type-level comparison of <tt>type-spine</tt>- and
--   <tt>type-cereal</tt>-enabled types. See the <tt>yoko</tt> package's
--   "Data.Yoko.HCompos" and "Data.Yoko.TH" modules for a (rather large)
--   use case.
@package type-ord-spine-cereal
@version 0.2


-- | Generic type-level comparison of <tt>type-spine</tt>- and
--   <tt>type-cereal</tt>-enabled types.
module Type.Ord.SpineSerialize
type SpineCompare l r = Compare (Spine l) (Spine r)
type Compare l r = SpineCompare l r
spineSerializeType :: Name -> Q [Dec]
spineSerializeTypeAsHash :: Name -> Q [Dec]
spineSerializeType_pro :: Name -> Q [Dec]
spineSerializeTypeAsHash_pro :: Name -> Q [Dec]
